attributes.action: Raise public awareness of the advances in Extraterrestrial Biological Entity research
attributes.additional_details:
We the signed request the government raise public awareness in the advancements in the search for extraterrestrial intelligence and the suspected extraterrestrial bodies currently being analysed around the world.

http://prufospolicedatabase.co.uk/1.html
http://www.disclosureproject.org/
http://www.sirius.neverendinglight.com/
http://www.starchildproject.com/
http://drgreersblog.disclosureproject.org/

We also request the government raise awareness of the disclosure of extraterrestrials by astronauts including but not restricted to Gordon Cooper, Buzz Aldrin and Edgar Mitchell.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XkwxuHE03aM
